creator: duffymo@yahoo.com
text:
I added the <vssget> optional task to my working build.xml.  It was successful 
in recursively getting out all of my source code in read-only mode and loading 
it into my folder, but when it was finished Ant claimed that the task failed 
and would not proceed on to the compilation step:

C:\Projects\IPTranslator>ant
Buildfile: build.xml

init-props:

prepare:
    [mkdir] Created dir: C:\Projects\IPTranslator\output
    [mkdir] Created dir: C:\Projects\IPTranslator\output\classes
    [mkdir] Created dir: C:\Projects\IPTranslator\output\lib
    [mkdir] Created dir: C:\Projects\IPTranslator\deploy
    [mkdir] Created dir: C:\Projects\IPTranslator\javadocs
    [mkdir] Created dir: C:\Projects\IPTranslator\reports

set-classpath:

convert-classpath:
     [echo] CLASSPATH: C:\Projects\IPTranslator

check-out:
   [vssget] $/Java Applications/IPTranslator:
   [vssget] Getting readme.html
   [vssget]
   [vssget] $/Java Applications/IPTranslator/bin:
   [vssget] Getting ip.bat
   [vssget]
   [vssget] $/Java Applications/IPTranslator/images:
   [vssget] A writable copy of C:\Projects\IPTranslator\build.xml already exists
   [vssget] Getting IPTranslator.gif
   [vssget]
   [vssget] $/Java Applications/IPTranslator/lib:
   [vssget] Getting junit.jar
   [vssget]
   [vssget] $/Java Applications/IPTranslator/META-INF:
   [vssget] Getting manifest.mf
   [vssget]
   [vssget] $/Java Applications/IPTranslator/src:
   [vssget] Getting overview.html
   [vssget]
   [vssget] $/Java Applications/IPTranslator/src/com:
   [vssget] $/Java Applications/IPTranslator/src/com/kaman:
   [vssget] $/Java Applications/IPTranslator/src/com/kaman/util:
   [vssget] Getting CommandLinePairs.java
   [vssget] Getting NetUtils.java
   [vssget] Getting NetUtilsTestCase.java
   [vssget]

BUILD FAILED

C:\Projects\IPTranslator\build.xml:104: Failed executing: \\kac2kwd1\vss$\win32
\ss Get "$/Java Applications/IPTranslator
" -GLC:\Projects\IPTranslator -I- -R -Yduffym,love2swim

Total time: 2 seconds
C:\Projects\IPTranslator>

Why does Ant say this step failed when its results look correct?

Here's the JDK I'm using:

C:\Projects\IPTranslator>java -version
java version "1.4.0-rc"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.4.0-rc-b91)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.4.0-rc-b91, mixed mode)

creator: duffymo@yahoo.com
text:
Sorry - I found the problem.  I had a writable build.xml when I started, so 
vssget returned a status code of 100, as it should.  When I made build.xml read-
only, all was well.  Not a bug - pilot error.  Thanks - sorry for taking your 
time.   Sincerely, MOD
